description: '''Black Veil Brides''' is an American [[Rock music|rock]] band based in [[Hollywood, Los Angeles|Hollywood]], California. The group formed in 2006 in [[Cincinnati]], [[Ohio]], and is currently composed of lead vocalist [[Andy Biersack]], multi instrumentalist [[Jinxx]], lead guitarist [[Jake Pitts]], drummer Christian "CC" Coma and bassist Lonny Eagleton. Black Veil Brides are known for their use of black [[Eye liner|makeup]], [[Body painting|body paint]], tight black studded clothing, and long hair, which were all inspired by the stage personas of [[Kiss (band)|Kiss]] and [[Mötley Crüe]], as well as other 1980s [[glam metal]] acts.
